page.title: 09TRANSPORT ROUND CLOPHILL
page.content: { Public Transport}in{Clophill}is not very frequent or cheap. We have{buses to{Luton}hourly but to{Bedford}the routes divide so it is a two hourly service to{Ampthill}or{Wilshamsted.}We have a weekly bus to{Flitwick}for the market and monthly buses to{Milton {Keynes}and{Hitchin. The nearest{railway station}is at {Flitwick.}This provides a good and frequent service to{London. Nearby{Luton Airport}is mainly for {charter holidays}and{freight}but a major expansion is planned which will improve{scheduled flights. In our survey we found that most fathers go to work by{car.}The{buses are used by mothers and children. Of car owning families{47%}had more than one car. Older children are bused to school by the Local Authority.
